AI Rescue Ring uses Android's Accessibility Service to provide a better user experience.

Why we need this permission:
‚Ä¢ Detect when the keyboard appears to automatically move the rescue ring out of the way
‚Ä¢ Detect system UI elements to ensure the ring stays visible and accessible

What we use it for:
‚Ä¢ Smart positioning - automatically repositioning the floating ring
‚Ä¢ Keyboard detection - moving the ring when you type
‚Ä¢ Window monitoring - tracking app changes for optimal ring placement

What we DON'T do:
‚Ä¢ We do NOT collect any personal data
‚Ä¢ We do NOT share any information with third parties
‚Ä¢ We do NOT read your screen content
‚Ä¢ We do NOT track your activity

This permission is only used to improve the floating ring's behavior on your device.

In the next screen, find and enable "AI Rescue Ring" in accessibility settings.
